channel.title: Dementhium 637/639
channel.description:
Hello i need help with 4 things.
i Am also looking for a coder for my server.
1. is it possible to add 2 worlds on a demehtium ike when u login u go to world select an u chose betteween 1 or 2 cause i wana make one pk and other skilling.
2. How can i create a new rank i need a owner rank and head-admin rank.
3. How can i make a ertra crown like mod has one crown and admin has one but how can i make one more for like dev. i got the image i wanna use has crown just dont know how.
4. not really needed but i would like to have how can i make a really good tittle system i say so many but they are not compatible with dememthium like u have 12 ranks and u do like ::giverank (playername) (rank ID) and if u wanna demote player from rank u do ::demoterank (player name), it really be cool if u could help me me with this.
P.S sorry about my bad english im more french theyn english.
